skill.name: project-planning
skill.description: Generate initial project planning documents (PVS, ADR, Tech Spec, Roadmap) from a project concept description. Use when starting a new project, when docs/planning/ contains placeholder files, or when user requests project planning document generation.
skill.summary: Generate initial project planning documents (PVS, ADR, Tech Spec, Roadmap) from a project concept de...
skill.author: ByronWilliamsCPA

security_audit.summary: Pure documentation skill with no external network calls, no credential access, and no dangerous code execution. The validation script reads markdown files locally for completeness checks only.

content.value_statement: Creating project planning documents from scratch is time-consuming and error-prone. This skill generates four essential documents (Project Vision, ADRs, Tech Spec, Roadmap) following best practices, saving hours of upfront work.
actual_capabilities: Generates Project Vision & Scope document from user description
Creates Architecture Decision Records (ADRs) for key technical choices
Produces Technical Implementation Specification with tech stack details
Builds phased Development Roadmap with milestones and tasks
Synthesizes all documents into comprehensive PROJECT-PLAN.md
limitations: Requires user to provide initial project description and constraints
Does not execute code or modify existing files automatically
Expert review step needs zen-mcp-server or manual review
Templates follow specific structure; custom formats require modification

use_cases.title: Start new projects faster
use_cases.description: Generate complete planning documentation in minutes instead of hours

use_cases.title: Standardize architectural decisions
use_cases.description: Create consistent ADRs that capture rationale and alternatives

use_cases.title: Provide context for AI coding
use_cases.description: Give AI assistants clear specifications to prevent hallucinations

prompt_templates.title: Basic project description
prompt_templates.prompt: I want to build a [project type] for [target users] that [main capability]. Use Python 3.12 with UV package manager. Generate project planning documents.

prompt_templates.title: With tech constraints
prompt_templates.prompt: Create planning docs for a [web API / CLI tool / data pipeline]. Requirements: Python, PostgreSQL, Docker, GitHub Actions. Focus on [specific domain].

prompt_templates.title: With existing context
prompt_templates.prompt: We are adding [new feature] to our [existing project type]. Generate ADR and update roadmap to include this in Phase 2.

prompt_templates.title: Full synthesis
prompt_templates.prompt: All four planning documents are generated. Now run synthesis to create PROJECT-PLAN.md and create the first phase branch feat/phase-0-foundation.

output_examples.input: Generate planning documents for a CLI personal finance manager in Python with Click
output: Generated: project-vision.md - Problem statement, target users, core capabilities
Generated: adr-001-database-choice.md - SQLite selected for local storage
Generated: tech-spec.md - Python 3.12, Click CLI, SQLite data layer
Generated: roadmap.md - 4 phases with milestones and tasks
Validation: All documents pass quality checks
Next: Run synthesis or review documents before development

best_practices: Provide specific constraints (tech stack, timeline, team size) for better results
Review generated ADRs - they capture important architectural decisions
Run validation script to ensure documents meet quality standards
Update documents as the project evolves to maintain accuracy
anti_patterns: Skipping ADR creation - architectural drift will occur without documented decisions
Using generated documents without review - validate assumptions early
Ignoring scope boundaries - stay focused on MVP features initially
Creating overly generic documents - replace all placeholders with specifics

faq.question: What AI tools support this skill?
faq.answer: Compatible with Claude, Claude Code, and OpenAI Codex. Requires zen-mcp-server for expert review step.

faq.question: How long do documents take to generate?
faq.answer: Full document set generates in 2-5 minutes depending on project complexity and revision needs.

faq.question: Can I customize the templates?
faq.answer: Yes. Modify templates in templates/ directory to match your organization standards.

faq.question: Is my project data safe?
faq.answer: All processing is local. Documents are written to your docs/planning/ directory only.

faq.question: What if validation fails?
faq.answer: Check for placeholder text, missing sections, or broken cross-references. Fix issues and re-run validation.

faq.question: How is this different from other planning tools?
faq.answer: Designed specifically for AI-assisted development with ADRs, cross-references, and consensus review built-in.
